content: Hi folks! I'm a robotics MSc student looking for a PhD next year. I'm learning Lean to develop tools for engineering students. Hit me up if you're nearby, I'd love to chat :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes:
Hey, I'm from the FMT group in the zilverling building. I have a colleague in my team and we regularly discuss Lean, if you're still around we should hang out!
Anyone else who's here of course feel free to reach out to us as well :) We're in room Zi 3082. We also have some group members working with Isabelle.
